OrgName.entry: AGE CONCERN SHEFFIELD - CHOICE SOCIAL GROUP

Desc.entry:
A chargeable service available to anyone aged 50 years and over, including those in receipt of direct payments, who would like the opportunity to learn skills and find support and friendship from others.
The service consists of a 12 week rolling programme of groups that provide a convenient and friendly place to meet new friends and like minded individuals to share interests and hobbies with. The package consists of 12 weekly 4 hour sessions, which are tailored to the groups need via support planning. Age concern will act as a facilitator supporting the group to share common interests, skills and hobbies and will help the group to buy equipment if needed. They will also support individuals to find out about and link-up with transport options to the venues.
Please contact for further information.
